parameters: \nd<Marcus>I think, I should talk to Dad first.
\nd<Dad>Yeah.. a favor. I need you to take some
\nd<Dad>It's mushroom. It's important, I have to make
some concoction, but I don't have the mushroom.
\nd<Marcus>Oh, I get it now. Where can I look for it?
\nd<Dad>You can find at the forest outside!
At the \c[4]Lumbica Forest\c[0], if I'm not wrong.
\nd<Marcus>OK! I'll go get the herbs, Dad!
\nd<Dad>Oh yeah! You can take Damian with you,
if he doesn't mind to you.
He's doing nothing at his home.
\nd<Dad>The house is the one that has the green roof.
\nd<Dad>But you should have already know that,
he is your best friend after all. Ha ha ha ...
\nd<Dad>Take some things at the chest in my room.
It should helps if you run into trouble.
Damian has joined up the party!
\nd<Old Man>You and Damian are so close each other.
How is your feeling about your friend?
\nd<Marcus>Well, he is my childhood, you know.
\nd<Marcus>He is my very best friend at all.
\nd<Old Man>Is that so? Well, that's good to hear.
You should be grateful for having a friend like him.
\nd<Old Woman>Your dad is a hard worker here, he worked
very hard to fulfill his family's demand.
\nd<Old Woman>And also he is powerful warrior...
\nd<Marcus>I think, I should talk to dad first.
\nd<Marcus>Wait, hold on! I forgot to talk to Damian.
His house has a green roof, isn't it?
\nd<Marcus>I must take some equipment from chest first.
\nd<Marcus>Wait, hold on! I forgot to talk to Damian.
His house has a green roof, isn't it?
